The files are in .bin .cue format.
Start your burning program (like Nero)
and choose burn from cue sheet.
Or mount them on a virtuel drive using
Alcohol or other .iso programs.
Got a lot of other video learning stuff.
LearnKey, Lyndacom, CBT Nuggets etc.
Let me know if you want me to upload anything of it.
